text: Aakash Talwar is an Indian television actor. Born in the Indian town of Amritsar which is well known for the Golden Temple and Kapil Sharma. Aakash is now based in Mumbai and is known for his role of Kabir in Channel V India's Mastaangi. Currently he is portraying the role of Harsh in Balaji Telefilms's Daayan on &TV.; ==Career== He has had roles in various Indian television shows including: MTV Webbed, Yeh Hai Aashiqui, Nadaan Parindey Ghar Aaja, Pyaar Tune Kya Kiya, and Aahat. He gained recognition playing the role of Kabir in Channel V India's Mastaangi. and Varun in the second season of Kaisi Yeh Yaariyan. ==Television== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="margin-right: 0;" |- !
